attributes.action: Too many lies to get to power making democracy a joke.Sack politicians who lie
attributes.additional_details: Sack the politicians who go back and worm there way out on facts they stated , if there's evidence as there clearly was on both sides of wrong information how can people truly decide . Stand up for decent politics
attributes.background: This comes from both sides lying eg £350m on the bus slogan going to NHS by leave and many other false facts  .Making the people who lie and con best to gain power. I don't know what the answer is but it needs to be addressed . It's getting worse and sadly frustrating.This is not democracy
